body.p:
Springfield Ky
Nov 15th 1860 --
To his Excellency
B Magoffin Govr of Ky --

A Petition was handed me by Mr B Cheser to sign for the release of his son from Jail, I was not present at the trial and did not hear the evidence, and for this reason did not sign it -- I am well acquainted with Mr Cheser, and can state that he is a very poor, honest & clever man, and one that abides by the laws of his Country. his son is young and inexperienced and is also poor; & I can safely say that his case is one that calls for your clemency
